src:
意甲-C罗进球被吹+读秒点杀 尤文2-1力压国米居首位

01 Nov 2019, 02:51

【网易体育31日讯】2019-2020赛季意甲第10轮比赛的一场大战开打，尤文图斯在主场对战热那亚。上半场比赛，博努奇头球攻门得手，夸梅禁区前右脚打门打在左脚，皮球反弹后反而飞入球门。下半场比赛，C罗伤停补时阶段进球，但是被吹越位在先，随后C罗亲自造点并主罚命中。全场比赛结束，尤文图斯主场2-1战胜热那亚，10轮26分领先国米的25分继续位居意甲榜首。尤文首发（4231）：77-布冯/16-夸德拉多、19-博努奇、24-鲁加尼、12-桑德罗/6-赫迪拉（61’25-拉比奥）、30-本坦库尔、14-马图伊迪（61’8-拉姆塞）/33-贝尔纳代斯基（79’11-道格拉斯-科斯塔）/10-迪巴拉、7-C罗。热那亚首发（433）：97-拉杜/18-吉里奥尼、17-克里斯蒂安-罗梅罗、2-萨帕塔、32-安克尔森/20-舍内、28-凯文-阿古德洛、29-卡萨塔/19-潘德夫（68’10-居米什）、11-夸梅（81’9-萨纳夫里亚）、99-皮纳蒙蒂。
text:
Serie A - Ronaldo scored a blow + countdown killing Juventus 2-1 pressure Inter Milan tops

01 Nov 2019, 02:51

[Netease Sports 31st News] 2019-2020 season Serie A round 10 game started, Juventus played at home against Genoa. In the first half of the game, Bonucci scored with a header and Kwame hit the right foot in front of the penalty area and hit the left foot. After the ball rebounded, he flew into the goal. In the second half of the game, C Ronaldo scored a goal at the time of the stoppage, but was blown offside, and C Ronaldo made a point and made a penalty. At the end of the game, Juventus defeated Genoa 2-1 at home, and scored 25 points in the 10 rounds and 26 points ahead of Inter Milan to continue to top the Serie A. Juventus starting (4231): 77-Buffon/16-Quadardo, 19-Bonucci, 24-Rugani, 12-Sandro/6-Khedira (61'25-Rabbio) , 30-Bencourt, 14-Matudi (61'8-Ramsey)/33-Bernadesky (79'11-Douglas-Costa)/10-Dibala, 7- Ronaldo. Genoa starting (433): 97-Radu/18-Giorgini, 17-Christian Romero, 2-Sapata, 32-Ankersen/20-Schoen, 28-Kevin-Agu Delo, 29-Casata/19-Pandoff (68'10-Guish), 11-Kwame (81'9-Sanafria), 99-Pinamonti.
